caption: An orange cat sits inside a car. The car arrives at a luxurious mansion. A person is swimming in the pool, and as he emerges from the pool, he puts on some clothes. A duck jumps into the water by the pool. In the courtyard, a group of animals gathers. Inside a room, three people are seated at a podium, with many others listening below. One person seems dissatisfied with those above. A group of tourists gathers outside the estate. Inside a barn, various animals kneel before an orange cat. The cat enters the hall. A person carrying a basket walks across the estate's lawn. A man drives through a city, passing numerous buildings. He stops in front of a hotel and checks in, engaging in conversation with the receptionist.
